text: Chukabꞌ qꞌij ri Pablo xuqujeꞌ ri uj xujel bꞌik pa Tolemaida, xujeꞌ pa ri tinimit Cesarea, are uj kꞌo chi chilaꞌ xujeꞌ cho rachoch ri Felipe, tzijol rech ri Utz laj uTzij ri Dios, jun chike ri wuqubꞌ patanijelabꞌ ri xechaꞌ pa Jerusalén.21:8 Ri “wuqubꞌ patanijelabꞌ”: Chawila we riꞌ pa Hechos 6:1-6.
